The Best Game without Shooting, in First Person. Really something special. This time it has coop, which makes it just better than the first one. Hardly something you should miss.

A classic. Anyone who enjoys playing and considers themselves a gamer should play this once in their life, i think it could even be considered one of the best games of all time together with Portal 1. 10/10

"Если вы можете представить себе общество, где лакеями будут роботы, вы можете представить все, что угодно."
—  Алан Джей Перлис
Świetna gra do solo i coopa , zainteresuje każdego fana łamigłówek. Poza poziomami wbudowanymi w gre , istnieje niezliczona masa poziomów społeczności.

Um pouco complicado, mas mt massa pra jogar com um amigo!

The game's story was great, the puzzles were fun, but fun because they were hard to solve, so you actually had to, "think." If you love puzzles then this game is great, if you don't, try the co-op. It gets crazy. :>
Очень атмосферная и сложная сюжетка, хоть игра 2014 года она не уступает по графикенекоторым играм 2019 года.
Jogo bom para jogar com os amigos

Super packende Story die nicht nur die grauen Zellen, sondern auch Jump and Run skills fordert...

Ein Muss, dass steht auf jeden Fall fest!

este juego es genial no inporta si lo terminas rapido o no la comunidad siempre busca mas.

I prefer this to the first game because of the added story and using laser cubes instead of the bouncing energy balls in Portal. It still has all the fun puzzle elements from Portal with much more story background too.
It is just fun and a great game over all
Trés bon jeux, le multi est vraiment chouette
Es uno de los juegos que más me e picado y más por sus mecánicas recomendado al 100

Juego imprescindible, he comprado el juego sin haber jugado al primero y con muchas dudas sobre si me gustaría, me ha parecido una obra maestra, me ha tenido enganchado de principio a fin, han sido los 81 céntimos mejor invertidos de mi vida :D. 
Probablemente me compre el 1 y ojalá algún día podamos ver el 3.
Muito bom, um dos melhores se não for  o melhor jogo para passar tempo, pensar e se divertir

Portal 2 just expands on the original, doing the first person puzzler even better. Keeps the witty dialogue from an evil villain. Has awesome puzzles with even more elements to play around with this time. Has Stephen Merchant. Has easter eggs and an even more creepy world. 

This is also one of the best co-op games around as well as being one of the best puzzle games of all time. Just get it, there's endless content with the workshop or you can just play through the story which is satisfying in itself. It's cheap as hell on sale and there's no reason not to play it if you are one of the few who haven't.
В это игре мне всё понравилось рекомендую, 7 раз уже прошёл её.
tis cool but coop is the best
